name: Daily Petrol, Diesel, LPG & CNG Fuel Prices in India
title: Daily Petrol, Diesel, LPG & CNG Fuel Prices in India
tool_name: Daily Petrol, Diesel, LPG & CNG Fuel Prices in India

api_list.name: LowestFuelPriceCitiesOnDate
api_list.description: List of Cities with Lowest Fuel Price on a Past Date

required_parameters.name: isoDate
required_parameters.description: Any date in last 30 days in ISO Format

required_parameters.name: fuelType
required_parameters.description: Fuel Type

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Limit the number of results returned

api_list.name: HighestFuelPriceCitiesOnDate
api_list.description: List of Cities with Highest Fuel Price on a Past Date

required_parameters.name: fuelType
required_parameters.description: Fuel Type

required_parameters.name: isoDate
required_parameters.description: Any date in last 30 days in ISO Format

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Limit the number of results returned

api_list.name: AllCitiesFuelPriceOnDate
api_list.description: Fuel Price in all Cities on a Past Date

required_parameters.name: stateId
required_parameters.description: ID of the State (find the ID of the state via the 'List of States API')

required_parameters.name: isoDate
required_parameters.description: Any date in last 30 days in ISO Format

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-petrol-diesel-lpg-cng-fuel-prices-in-india.p.rapidapi.com/v1/fuel-prices/2022-09-01/india/maharashtra/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-petrol-diesel-lpg-cng-fuel-prices-in-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ListCities

required_parameters.name: stateId
required_parameters.description: ID of the State (find the ID of the state via the 'List of States API')

optional_parameters.name: isoDate
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Any date in last 30 days in ISO Format. Filter the list of states/cities containing fuel prices on the requested date

optional_parameters.name: fuelTypes
optional_parameters.description: Filter the list of states/cities containing the prices for the requested fuel type

applicableOn.description: The ISO date from which the current retail price is applicable from

retailPrice.description: The price of the fuel in the retail outlets

retailPriceChange.description: The change in the price of the fuel in retail outlets, compared to the previous day

retailPriceChangeInterval.description: The interval within which the retail price change is applicable

retailUnit.description: The unit sold in the retail for which the retailPrice is applicable
